mapper.select: select id, appid, wxopenid, template_id, popup_sence, subscribe_status_string, create_time, last_modified_time, send_status, send_result from wechat_subscribe_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wechat_subscribe_info(appid, wxopenid, template_id, popup_sence, subscribe_status_string, create_time, last_modified_time, send_status, send_result) values (#{appid}, #{wxopenid}, #{templateId}, #{popupSence}, #{subscribeStatusString}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifiedTime}, #{sendStatus}, #{sendResult})

insert into wechat_subscribe_info(appid, wxopenid, template_id, popup_sence, subscribe_status_string, create_time, last_modified_time, send_status, send_result) values
(#{entity.appid}, #{entity.wxopenid}, #{entity.templateId}, #{entity.popupSence}, #{entity.subscribeStatusString}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime}, #{entity.sendStatus}, #{entity.sendResult})

insert into wechat_subscribe_info(appid, wxopenid, template_id, popup_sence, subscribe_status_string, create_time, last_modified_time, send_status, send_result) values
(#{entity.appid}, #{entity.wxopenid}, #{entity.templateId}, #{entity.popupSence}, #{entity.subscribeStatusString}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime}, #{entity.sendStatus}, #{entity.sendResult})
on duplicate key update appid = values(appid), wxopenid = values(wxopenid), template_id = values(template_id), popup_sence = values(popup_sence), subscribe_status_string = values(subscribe_status_string), create_time = values(create_time), last_modified_time = values(last_modified_time), send_status = values(send_status), send_result = values(send_result)
mapper.update:
update wechat_subscribe_info
appid = #{appid},
wxopenid = #{wxopenid},
template_id = #{templateId},
popup_sence = #{popupSence},
subscribe_status_string = #{subscribeStatusString},
create_time = #{createTime},
last_modified_time = #{lastModifiedTime},
send_status = #{sendStatus},
send_result = #{sendResult},
where id = #{id}
